Body:
s = spectrographs.keck_lris.KeckLRISRSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'keck_lris_red', 'long_600_7500_d560', 'LR.20160216.05529.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Keck LRIS red read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (2068, 1110)
assert bpm.shape == (2048, 1024)
dev_suite_required
